root.name: Samurai Warriors: Chronicles 2nd
root.description: OverviewSamurai Warriors: Chronicles 2nd is an upcoming sequel to the Tecmo Koei 3DS launch title Samurai Warriors: Chronicles. The sequel will feature new officers as well as a story mode with branching paths. The game will also feature a mission mode that can be played with others in local multiplayer, as well as online leaderboards.Download versionFile size: 1,800MB (1.75GB)
